mapper.select: select att.FNAME_L2 as title,att.FREMOTEPATH as webUrl,ass.FBOID as easId,att.FCREATETIME as createTime, att.FNUMBER as num,att.FTYPE as type,att.FSIZE as attSize,u.FNAME_L2 as creatorName from T_BAS_BoAttchAsso ass left join T_BAS_Attachment att on ass.FATTACHMENTID=att.FID left join T_PM_User u on u.fid=att.FCREATORID where ass.FBOID=#{id} and att.FNAME_L2 is not null order by att.FREMOTEPATH
